Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10 Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for illumigene Pertussis DNA Amplification Assay using loop-mediated isothermal amplification (LAMP) for qualitative detection of Bordetella pertussis DNA from nasopharyngeal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Bordetella pertussis DNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from patients suspected of respiratory tract infection attributable to B. pertussis, performed on the illumipro-10 system.
